data.lyric:
[ti:Still Goin Down]
[ar:Morgan Wallen]
[al:Still Goin Down]
[by:]
[offset:0]
[00:00.00]Still Goin Down - Morgan Wallen
[00:04.25]Lyrics by：Morgan Wallen
[00:08.51]Composed by：Morgan Wallen
[00:12.77]The way I talk I guess I got it from my pops
[00:15.98]Product of some kneelin' down
[00:17.60]In a town where the doors don't lock
[00:20.87]And there's a million other people like me
[00:23.25]From a scene a little more podunk than pop
[00:27.17]I didn't choose being born in the sticks
[00:29.82]And I'll be d***ned if I sound like something I ain't
[00:33.63]For some folks a backroad gets old
[00:36.35]But for me it just can't
[00:38.68]'Cause I'm from a small town southern drawl crowd
[00:42.77]We're sippin' clear drinkin' beer on a Friday night
[00:46.02]Every country girl got on her cutoffs
[00:49.23]Shakin' her hips take a trip buddy tell me I'm a liar
[00:53.14]Still circle up big trucks around a fire
[00:56.38]Still kickin' up some dust behind the tires
[00:59.48]Call it cliché but hey just take it from me
[01:03.42]It's still goin' down out in the country
[01:18.30]Somewhere now someone's out there
[01:20.50]Sippin' on some hundred proof
[01:22.72]Everyday a baby's born with some baby blues
[01:25.91]A good ol' boy's got on his faded boots
[01:28.84]Workin' a nine to five
[01:31.26]I'm just another southern hell raiser
[01:33.79]Ain't breakin' ground
[01:34.99]Makin' sound for them drop-it-down tailgaters
[01:37.69]But y'all that's all I know to say
[01:40.24]So if you think I'm full of it ain't done it check the resume
[01:43.59]'Cause I'm from a small town southern drawl crowd
[01:47.67]We're sippin' clear drinkin' beer on a Friday night
[01:50.95]Every country girl got on her cutoffs
[01:54.00]Shakin' her hips take a trip buddy tell me I'm a liar
[01:57.95]Still circle up big trucks around a fire
[02:01.30]Still kickin' up some dust behind the tires
[02:04.31]Call it cliché but hey just take it from me
[02:08.21]It's still goin' down out in the country
[02:22.47]'Cause I'm from a small town southern drawl crowd
[02:26.34]We're sippin' clear drinkin' beer on a Friday night
[02:29.81]Every country girl got on her cutoffs
[02:32.89]Shakin' her hips take a trip buddy tell me I'm a liar
[02:36.87]Still circle up big trucks around a fire
[02:40.23]Still kickin' up some dust behind the tires
[02:43.21]Call it cliché but hey just take it from me
[02:47.15]It's still goin' down out in the country
data.trans:
[ti:Still Goin Down]
[ar:Morgan Wallen]
[al:Still Goin Down]
[by:]
[offset:0]
[00:00.00]腾讯享有本翻译作品的著作权
[00:04.25]//
[00:08.51]//
[00:12.77]我说话的腔调 我想这是从我爸爸那里学来的
[00:15.98]这是妥协的产物
[00:17.60]在一座不用锁门的小镇上
[00:20.87]这里有无数像我一样的普通人
[00:23.25]来自一个偏僻质朴的小镇
[00:27.17]我没有选择出生在乡下
[00:29.82]如果我无法保持原来的模样 我会惊慌失措
[00:33.63]对于一些人而言 僻静乡道愈发陈旧
[00:36.35]但是对我来说 它生机盎然
[00:38.68]因为我来自小镇 到处都是操着南方口音的人群
[00:42.77]周五夜晚 我们畅饮美味的啤酒
[00:46.02]每个乡下姑娘都穿着短裤
[00:49.23]扭动电臀 四处旅行 朋友告诉我 我是个骗子
[00:53.14]依然把皮卡围成一圈 在中间点燃篝火
[00:56.38]轮胎后面依然尘土飞扬
[00:59.48]称之为陈词滥调 但是请相信我
[01:03.42]这样的场景依然在乡村上演
[01:18.30]此时此刻 有人正坐在酒吧里
[01:20.50]啜饮着烈酒
[01:22.72]每一天 长着一双湛蓝眼眸的婴孩降生于世
[01:25.91]一个善良的男孩穿上他已经褪色的靴子
[01:28.84]做着朝九晚五的工作
[01:31.26]我只是另一个为南方卖力宣传的人
[01:33.79]不会奠定重要基础
[01:34.99]为那些驾车尽情追逐的人歌唱
[01:37.69]但是你们 这是我想说的一切
[01:40.24]如果你认为我心满意足 不会感到厌倦 查看一下简历
[01:43.59]因为我来自小镇 到处都是操着南方口音的人群
[01:47.67]周五夜晚 我们畅饮美味的啤酒
[01:50.95]每个乡下姑娘都穿着短裤
[01:54.00]扭动电臀 四处旅行 朋友告诉我 我是个骗子
[01:57.95]依然把皮卡围成一个圈 在中间点燃篝火
[02:01.30]轮胎后面依然尘土飞扬
[02:04.31]称之为陈词滥调 但是请相信我
[02:08.21]这样的场景依然在乡村上演
[02:22.47]因为我来自小镇 到处都是操着南方口音的人群
[02:26.34]周五夜晚 我们畅饮美味的啤酒
[02:29.81]每个乡下姑娘都穿着短裤
[02:32.89]扭动电臀 四处旅行 朋友告诉我 我是个骗子
[02:36.87]依然把皮卡围成一个圈 在中间点燃篝火
[02:40.23]轮胎后面依然尘土飞扬
[02:43.21]称之为陈词滥调 但是请相信我
[02:47.15]这样的场景依然在乡村上演
